title: Planning Poker Cards
summary: Use your phone or Android Wear watch during your Agile planning poker sessions!
description: No paper cards available during your Agile planning poker sessions? Or just not a big fan of paper cards?This app lets you use your phone to do the estimations!If you have an Android Wear watch, you can control the app with it! Change the card and toggle the visibility right from your wrist!Features:- full Agile planning poker card set, including "?" and "need a break"- modern design, based on the Material design principles- show or hide the card with the volume buttons, including optional vibration feedback- Android Wear support to control the app from your watch
descriptionHTML:
No paper cards available during your Agile planning poker sessions? Or just not a big fan of paper cards?

This app lets you use your phone to do the estimations!

If you have an Android Wear watch, you can control the app with it! Change the card and toggle the visibility right from your wrist!

Features:
- full Agile planning poker card set, including "?" and "need a break"
- modern design, based on the Material design principles
- show or hide the card with the volume buttons, including optional vibration feedback
- Android Wear support to control the app from your watch
